name: shoppingMate App
description:
A web application for managing and sharing shopping lists.

Built with React using functional components, component hierarchy, state management and React router for the front end. The app integrates a RESTful API built with Node.js, using Express and Mongoose at the back end.
The site was built and styled using SASS, CSS3 and HTML5.

name: Web Developer Portfolio
description:
The page you are looking at:
